Hello,
Does anyone know how long it is necessary to charge the first time of these batteries in order to not compromise neither the lifetime nor the charging capacity of the batteries?

Screenshot_20230120-230245_Chrome1080×2400 191 KB

For this type of battery, they don’t mind being charged to the top.

Here’s a handy table:

Battery University – 1 Sep 10

BU-415: How to Charge and When to Charge?
